title: [Fasthr's Lance, Infirmary]
description: The ramp scaling the tower comes to its end, framing a cozy infirmary.  Lined with downy beds, the careful organization of the room provides ample space to maneuver.  Across from a black steel stairwell leading up to a gap in the tower rooftop, a carved riverstone fireplace has been placed to lend heat to the cold stones encompassing the chamber.

The ramp scaling the tower comes to its end, framing a cozy infirmary.  Lined with downy beds, the careful organization of the room provides ample space to maneuver.  Across from a black steel stairwell leading up to a gap in the tower rooftop, a carved riverstone fireplace and a fired clay basket of sticks have been placed to lend heat to the cold stones encompassing the chamber.
